messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] to Tia - A drug problem- Algae  info?
messages.msgSnippet: Well, a couple of weeks ago, we could ve harvested plenty of algae from my swimming pool.  It looked like creamed spinach and did nothing for me other than
messages.messageBody:
Well, a couple of weeks ago, we could've harvested plenty of algae from my
swimming pool. It looked like creamed spinach and did nothing for me other
than give me a wicked sunburn on my back and piss me off. {g}

But, if you're not interested in that (understandably) here's a site for a
rather popular brand of algae: http://www.celltech.com/

I believe there are others, too, and if you type "blue-green algae" in
google, you'll come up with more sites.

Marji (who has quite a tan, now, and is no longer pissed off).


At 17:03 7/21/03 -0400, Teresa wrote:
>The algae, can you give me a link or some key words to google?. I am
>interested in finding out more
>
>Thanks
>Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
